content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5), boiler (position -11.5, 25.0), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5). This structure is responsible for generating electricity using steam.

### Copper plate furnace at position(0, 0) and position(5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0, 0) which is currently smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Furnace (position 5, 5) which is currently smelting iron ore into iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to smelting timeout
- Ensure that both furnaces have sufficient fuel and inputs before initiating the smelting process. Check the inventory of each furnace to confirm they have the required materials.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
